channel.title: Azure Data Factory on Niels Berglund
channel.description: Recent content in Azure Data Factory on Niels Berglund

item.title: Interesting Stuff - Week 16
item.description:
Throughout the week, I read a lot of blog-posts, articles, and so forth, that has to do with things that interest me:

  • data science
  • data in general
  • distributed computing
  • SQL Server
  • transactions (both db as well as non db)
  • and other “stuff”

This blog-post is the “roundup” of the things that have been most interesting to me, for the week just ending.

item.title: Interesting Stuff - Week 43
item.description:
